message: This proposal offers a fair split considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I'm willing to take a bigger risk and offer a more uneven split in hopes of getting a better deal later on.
Considering the inflation, I propose a balanced split that might be more appealing to Bob while ensuring a reasonable gain for me.
I'm trying to find a balance between taking a risk and getting a decent gain. This offer is a bit more aggressive than before, but I'm willing to compromise.
